line_1: To starve a Man, in Law, is Murther.
line_2: To push this Argument no further;

line_1: And barely stopp'd on this side murther;
line_2: But SELIM'S crimes, he said, went further,

line_1: Was taken up, and hung for murder;
line_2: But, ere I could proceed much further,
Or, let's suppose what's still absurder,
